pullrequest.title: Support new ErrorStr API in tinyxml2 6.0.0 (#28)

content.raw:
Since the definition is only used internally, I think we should prefer to use

`target_compile_definitions(${PROJECT_LIBRARY_TARGET_NAME} PRIVATE TINYXML2_MAJOR_VERSION_GE_6)`

In general, we should prefer to move away from having custom `config.hh` files per project, since that's usually indicative of an anti-pattern in the build system.

If my recommendation doesn't work for some reason, please let me know.
